review: Very good Cardiologist. Will hear our health problem with patience. Explains the diagnosis & treatment procedure well. Humanly approach.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He has been treating me for many years and he is a good and friendly Doctor. I am satisfied getting treated by him

I had met the doctor for a routine check-up. ****** *** **** ***** I would like to recommend this doctor to my family and friends. Doctor behavior was also good. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Medical tests were taken. There was no waiting time in the hospital. I have plans to go again. Diet, walking for 30 minutes was suggested. My cholesterol level is improved. Doctor was very friendly.
